subsection.name: Eclipse
subsection.p: Use Eclipse, at least Neon version

subsection.name: Eclipse plugins
subsection.p: Install M2e plugin in your Eclipse
Install Tycho Configurator as an additional maven connector

subsection.name: Check your installation by a basic checkout, compilation

ul.li: Clone the Papyrus Designer git repository git clone https://git.eclipse.org/r/papyrus/org.eclipse.papyrus-designer.
Run maven at the root of the repo: mvn clean install; it should pass
Get Papyrus designer maven eclipse plugins in your eclipse workspace
Et “Voila” you are good to go.

subsection.name: Target Environment
subsection.p: We have developed a target-platform-configuration artifact located at /org.eclipse.papyrus-designer/targetplatform/org.eclipse.papyrus.designer.targetplatform.neon/org.eclipse.papyrus.designer.targetplatform.neon.target
Open it and click at the upper right corner to set it has the target platform.
